mapper.select: SELECT * FROM User where UserName=#{userName} and Password=#{password}
select User.* from Friend,User where Friend.UserName = #{userName} and User.UserName = Friend.FriendName
select headImg from User where UserName = #{userName}
select * from Msg where senderName = #{name1} and receiverName = #{name2} or senderName = #{name2} and receiverName = #{name1}
select count(*) from Msg where senderName = #{name1} and receiverName = #{name2} and isRead = false
mapper.update: update Msg set isRead = true where senderName = #{name1} and receiverName = #{name2} and isRead = false
mapper.insert: insert into Msg(senderName, receiverName, msg, time, msgType,isRead) VALUES (#{senderName},#{receiverName},#{msg},#{time},#{msgType},#{isRead})
